name: The Hazards
description:
Meet Daniel; a tired 22 year old job seeker just trying to live his regular human life. Unfortunately for him, that regular life ends abruptly when he is abducted by a group of strange fuzzy aliens that call themselves 'The Chiros.' Escape with Daniel from a human prison, travel through colourful alien landscapes and join him in an action-packed isometric adventure. Hack 'n slash your way off the planet Chriopterria and prepare yourself for a fast paced experience you definitely shouldn't put on a resume!

Hollie McCurley - Project Lead, Animator, Artist, Graphics.

Aria Coles-Keen - Concept artist, Model rigger/texture maker/animator.

Zachary Clarke - Programmer.

George Bateup - Audio and FX, maps and gameplay Designer, lighting manager.

Damien Stergio - Systems and gameplay Designer, gameplay Tester.
